original: Öberg, Nils Olof Thjelvar, komminister, Visiby, f. 1/8/96 i Sundsvall av folkskoll. Sv^en Ö. o. Maria Kristoffersson. G. 35 m. Anna Havrén. Adoptivdotter: Käthe f. 44. — Stud:-ex. i Sun|dsvall 15, teol. fil. ex. 19, folkskoll:ex. 20, teol. kand., prakt, teol. prov samt prästvigd f. Visby stift 24. Stiftsadj. s. å., v. kommin. o. stadsmiss. i Visby 27, domkyrkoadj. 28-30, v. pastor sed. 28, domkyrkosyssloman 28-31 samt 44-46, domkyrko-kommin. sed. 30, pred. v. rannsakn:-häktet i Visby sed. 27 o. v. S :t Olofs sjukh. där sed. 33. Ordf. i kyrkofullm. LVOlkl.
translated: Öberg, Nils Olof Thjelvar, curate, Visby, b. 1/8/96 in Sundsvall to folk school teachers. Son of Ö. and Maria Kristoffersson. Married in 1935 to Anna Havrén. Adopted daughter: Käthe b. 1944. — Graduated from high school in Sundsvall in 1915, theology and philosophy degree in 1919, primary school teaching degree in 1920, theology candidate, practical theological examination, and ordained as a priest for Visby diocese in 1924. Diocesan adj. the same year, assistant curate and city missionary in Visby in 1927, cathedral adj. from 1928 to 1930, interim pastor from 1928, cathedral chaplain from 1928 to 1931 and from 1944 to 1946, cathedral curate from 1930, preacher at the investigation and detention center in Visby from 1927 and at St. Olof's hospital from 1933. Chairman of the church council in LVOlkl.
